visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have custom colors for the series, styled axes and labels with specific font sizes and colors, and include a legend. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year, with the series name 'Temperature'. Additionally, the chart should have a white background and specific margins for better visualization.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a white background with specific margins for better visualization. The x-axis represents the months of the year with styled labels, and the y-axis represents the temperature in degrees Celsius with a styled title and labels. The data series is named 'Temperature' and includes the monthly average temperature data. The series color is set to a custom color '#FF6347'. The legend is enabled and styled with a specific font size and color. This configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing representation of the monthly average temperature data.
